00014 SimpleString::StringData::StringData()
00015 {
00016     data = GetEmptyBuffer();
00017     length = 0;
00018 }

00020 SimpleString::StringData::StringData(const char* str)
00021 {
00022     data = NULL;        // in order to call SetData
00023     length = 0;
00024 
00025     SetData(str);
00026 }
00027 
00028 SimpleString::StringData::StringData(const StringData* base)
00029 {
00030     length = base->length;
00031     data = new OMISCID_TLM char[length + 1];
00032     memcpy(data, base->data, length);
00033     *(data+length) = '\0';
00034 }
00035 
00036 SimpleString::StringData::StringData(const StringData* base, int begin, int end)
00037 {
00038     int tmplen = end-begin;
00039     if ( base == (const StringData*)NULL || tmplen < 0 || (tmplen+begin) > (int)base->length  )
00040     {
00041 #ifdef DEBUG
00042         TemporaryMemoryBuffer TmpS(1024);
00043         sprintf( (char*)TmpS, "Bad parameter for SimpleString::StringData::StringData (%s)\nbase=%p\nbase->length=%d\nbegin=%d\nend=%d\ntmplen=%d\n", base->data, (void*)base, (int)base->length, begin, end, tmplen );
00044         throw SimpleException( (char*)TmpS );
00045 #else
00046         throw SimpleException( "Bad parameter for SimpleString::StringData::StringData" );
00047 #endif // DEBUG
00048     }
00049 
00050     if ( tmplen == 0 )
00051     {
00052         data = GetEmptyBuffer();
00053         length = 0;
00054     }
00055     else
00056     {
00057         length = end-begin;
00058         data = new OMISCID_TLM char[length + 1];
00059         memcpy(data, base->data+begin, length);
00060         *(data+length) = '\0';
00061     }
00062 }
00063 
00064 SimpleString::StringData::StringData(const char* str1, const char* str2)
00065 {
00066     int l1 = (int)strlen(str1);
00067     int l2 = (int)strlen(str2);
00068     length = l1+l2;
00069     data = new OMISCID_TLM char[length + 1];
00070     memcpy(data, str1, l1);
00071     memcpy(data+l1, str2, l2);
00072     *(data+length) = '\0';
00073 }
00074 
00075 SimpleString::StringData::StringData(const StringData* StringData1, const char* str2)
00076 {
00077     int l2 = (int)strlen(str2);
00078     length = StringData1->length + l2;
00079     data = new OMISCID_TLM char[length + 1];
00080     memcpy(data, StringData1->data, StringData1->length);
00081     memcpy(data+StringData1->length, str2, l2);
00082     *(data+length) = '\0';
00083 }
00084 
00085 SimpleString::StringData::StringData(const StringData* StringData1, const StringData* StringData2)
00086 {
00087     length = StringData1->length + StringData2->length;
00088     data = new OMISCID_TLM char[length + 1];
00089     memcpy(data, StringData1->data, StringData1->length);
00090     memcpy(data+StringData1->length, StringData2->data, StringData2->length);
00091     *(data+length) = '\0';
00092 }

00094 SimpleString::StringData::~StringData()
00095 {
00096     if ( data != (char*)NULL )
00097     {
00098         delete [] data;
00099     }
00100     data = NULL;
00101 }
00102 
00103 void SimpleString::StringData::SetData(const char* str)
00104 {
00105     if ( data != (char*)NULL )
00106     {
00107         delete [] data;
00108     }
00109 
00110     if ( str != (const char*)NULL )
00111     {
00112         length = (unsigned int)strlen(str);
00113         data = new OMISCID_TLM char[length+1];
00114         memcpy( data, str, length+1 ); // +1 for the '\0'
00115     }
00116     else
00117     {
00118         data = GetEmptyBuffer();
00119         length = 0;
00120     }
00121 }

00123 bool SimpleString::StringData::Equals(const char* str)
00124 {
00125     if ( str == (const char*)NULL )
00126     {
00127         if ( length == 0 )
00128         {
00129             // Both are empty, so they are equals
00130             return true;
00131         }
00132         return false;
00133     }
00134 
00135     return (strcmp(str, data) == 0);
00136 }

00139 {
00140     return ((this == &sd) || Equals(sd.data));
00141 }

00360 
00361 // WARNING DestroyStringData do not call protect
00362 void SimpleString::DestroyStringData()
00363 {
00364     if ( stringData != (StringData*)NULL )
00365     {
00366         delete stringData;
00367         stringData = (StringData*)NULL;
00368     }
00369 }
00370 
00374 void SimpleString::SetStringData(StringData* to_set)
00375 {
00376     if ( to_set == NULL )
00377     {
00378         // Set me as empty
00379         *this = EmptyString;
00380         return;
00381     }
00382 
00383     // Lock myself
00384     Lock();
00385 
00386     // First, destroy My data if any
00387     DestroyStringData();
00388 
00389     // and then just set the string data with incr reference count
00390     stringData = to_set;
00391 
00392     Unlock();
00393 }
00394 
00395 void SimpleString::Empty()
00396 {
00397     Lock();
00398 
00399     DestroyStringData();
00400     stringData = new OMISCID_TLM StringData();
00401 
00402     Unlock();
00403 }

00406 {

00409 
00410     DestroyStringData();
00411     // stringData = str.stringData;
00412     // stringData->AddReference();
00413     stringData = new OMISCID_TLM StringData(str.stringData);
00414 
00415     str.Unlock();
00416     Unlock();
00417 
00418     return *this;
00419 }

00509 void SimpleString::Append(const char* str)
00510 {
00511     if ( str != NULL )
00512     {
00513         Lock();
00514 
00515         StringData* tmp;
00516         if ( stringData != (StringData*)NULL )
00517         {
00518             tmp = new OMISCID_TLM StringData(stringData, str);
00519             DestroyStringData();
00520             stringData = tmp;
00521         }
00522         else
00523         {
00524             stringData = new OMISCID_TLM StringData(str);
00525         }
00526 
00527         Unlock();
00528     }
00529 }
00530 
00531 void SimpleString::Append(const SimpleString& str)
00532 {
00533     if ( str.stringData->length != 0 )
00534     {
00535         Lock();
00536         str.Lock();
00537 
00538         StringData* tmp = new OMISCID_TLM StringData(stringData, str.stringData);
00539         DestroyStringData();
00540         stringData = tmp;
00541 
00542         str.Unlock();
00543         Unlock();
00544     }
00545 }
00546 
00547 char SimpleString::operator[](int i) const
00548 {
00549     Lock();
00550 
00551     char tmp;
00552 
00553     if ( i < 0 || i >= (int)stringData->length )
00554     {
00555         Unlock();
00556         throw  SimpleException("SimpleString::out of bound");
00557     }
00558 
00559     tmp = *(stringData->data+i);
00560 
00561     Unlock();
00562 
00563     // retreive character at position
00564     return tmp;
00565 }
00566 
00567 char& SimpleString::operator[](int i)
00568 {
00569     Lock();
00570 
00571     if ( i < 0 || i >= (int)stringData->length )
00572     {
00573         Unlock();
00574         throw  SimpleException("SimpleString::out of bound");
00575     }
00576 
00577     char& tmp = *(stringData->data+i);
00578 
00579     Unlock();
00580 
00581     return tmp;
00582 }

00636 
00637 SimpleString SimpleString::SubString(int begin, int end) const
00638 {
00639     int lend = end;
00640 
00641     if ( lend < 0 )
00642     {
00643         if ( lend == -1 )
00644         {
00645             lend = GetLength();
00646         }
00647         else
00648         {
00649             return SimpleString::EmptyString;
00650         }
00651     }
00652 
00653     if ( begin >= lend )        // The Could not do the job, or job is empty return an empty string
00654     {
00655         return SimpleString::EmptyString;
00656     }
00657 
00658     // Lock myself
00659     Lock();
00660 
00661     StringData * sd = new OMISCID_TLM StringData((StringData*)stringData, begin, lend);
00662 
00663     // Unlock
00664     Unlock();
00665 
00666     if ( sd == NULL )
00667     {
00668         return EmptyString;
00669     }
00670     else
00671     {
00672         SimpleString TmpS;
00673         TmpS.SetStringData(sd);
00674         return TmpS;
00675     }
00676 }
00677 
00678 const SimpleString Omiscid::operator+(const SimpleString& str1, const SimpleString& str2)
00679 {
00680     if ( str1.GetLength() == 0 ) return SimpleString(str2);
00681     if ( str2.GetLength() == 0 ) return SimpleString(str1);
00682     return SimpleString(str1, str2);
00683 }
00684 
00685 const SimpleString Omiscid::operator+(const char* str1, const SimpleString& str2)
00686 {
00687     if ( str1 == NULL ) return SimpleString(str2);
00688     if ( str2.GetLength() == 0 ) return SimpleString(str1);
00689     return SimpleString( str1, str2 );
00690 }
00691 
00692 const SimpleString Omiscid::operator+(const SimpleString& str1, const char* str2)
00693 {
00694     if ( str1.GetLength() == 0 ) return SimpleString(str2);
00695     if ( str2 == NULL ) return SimpleString(str1);
00696     return SimpleString( str1, str2 );
00697 }
00698 
00699 int SimpleString::Find(const SimpleString SearchPattern, bool Backward /* = false */ ) const
00700 {
00701     char * TmpChar;
00702     char * Buffer;
00703     int CurrentLen;
00704 
00705     Lock();
00706     SearchPattern.Lock();
00707 
00708     if ( SearchPattern.stringData->length == 0 || SearchPattern.stringData->length > stringData->length )
00709     {
00710         SearchPattern.Unlock();
00711         Unlock();
00712         return -1;
00713     }
00714 
00715     // Get the current buffer
00716     Buffer = stringData->data;
00717 
00718     if ( Backward == false )
00719     {
00720         // Forward search
00721         TmpChar = strstr( Buffer, SearchPattern.stringData->data );
00722 
00723         SearchPattern.Unlock();
00724         Unlock();
00725 
00726         if ( TmpChar == NULL )
00727         {
00728             // Not Found
00729             return -1;
00730         }
00731         return (int)(TmpChar-Buffer);
00732     }
00733     else
00734     {
00735         // backward search from the end of the current string minus the len of the search string
00736         CurrentLen = stringData->length - SearchPattern.stringData->length;
00737         for( ; ; )
00738         {
00739             TmpChar = (char*)memrchr( (void*)Buffer, (int)SearchPattern[0], (size_t)CurrentLen );
00740             if ( TmpChar != NULL )
00741             {
00742                 if ( strncmp( TmpChar, SearchPattern.stringData->data, SearchPattern.stringData->length ) == 0 )
00743                 {
00744                     // ok, found
00745                     SearchPattern.Unlock();
00746                     Unlock();
00747                     return (int)(TmpChar-Buffer);
00748                 }
00749 
00750                 // Compute new search len for the next search
00751                 CurrentLen = CurrentLen - (int)(TmpChar-Buffer);
00752             }
00753             else
00754             {
00755                 SearchPattern.Unlock();
00756                 Unlock();
00757                 return -1;
00758             }
00759         }
00760     }
00761 }
00762 
00763 bool SimpleString::InternalReplaceFirst(const SimpleString& SearchPattern, const SimpleString& ReplacedPattern)
00764 {
00765     char * TmpChar;
00766     char * Buffer;
00767     SimpleString TmpString;
00768 
00769     if ( stringData->length == 0 )
00770     {
00771         // Nothing to find in an empty string
00772         return false;
00773     }
00774 
00775     Buffer = stringData->data;
00776 
00777     TmpChar = strstr( Buffer, SearchPattern.stringData->data );
00778     if ( TmpChar == NULL )
00779     {
00780         // Not Found
00781         return false;
00782     }
00783 
00784     if ( TmpChar == Buffer )    // Search String is at the beginning of the string
00785     {
00786         TmpString = SubString( SearchPattern.stringData->length, stringData->length );
00787     }
00788     else
00789     {
00790         // Build the string with the remplacement string
00791         TmpString = SubString(0, (int)(TmpChar-Buffer)) + ReplacedPattern + SimpleString(TmpChar + SearchPattern.stringData->length );
00792     }
00793 
00794     // Ok, now, I will contain the result
00795     *this = TmpString;
00796 
00797     return true;
00798 }
00799 
00800 bool SimpleString::ReplaceFirst(const SimpleString& SearchPattern, const SimpleString& ReplacedPattern)
00801 {
00802     Lock();
00803     SearchPattern.Lock();
00804     ReplacedPattern.Lock();
00805 
00806     bool ret = InternalReplaceFirst( SearchPattern, ReplacedPattern );
00807 
00808     ReplacedPattern.Unlock();
00809     SearchPattern.Unlock();
00810     Unlock();
00811 
00812     return ret;
00813 }
00814 
00815 bool SimpleString::ReplaceAll(const SimpleString& SearchPattern, const SimpleString& ReplacedPattern)
00816 {
00817     bool ret = false;
00818 
00819     Lock();
00820     SearchPattern.Lock();
00821     ReplacedPattern.Lock();
00822 
00823     while( InternalReplaceFirst( SearchPattern, ReplacedPattern ) )
00824     {
00825         ret = true;
00826     }
00827 
00828     ReplacedPattern.Unlock();
00829     SearchPattern.Unlock();
00830     Unlock();
00831 
00832     return ret;
00833 }

00837 using namespace std;
00838 
00839 /*
00840  * @brief A serialisation input operator
00841  * @param [in] is, an input stream
00842  * @param [in] str2, a char * buffer (ended by '0')
00843  * @return Returns the input stream
00844  */
00845 istream& Omiscid::operator>>( istream &is , SimpleString &str )
00846 {
00847     // To optimize !
00848     char c;
00849     bool LineIsNotTerminated;
00850 
00851     // Create a new buffer,
00852     TemporaryMemoryBuffer TmpS( 256 );
00853 
00854     str.Empty();
00855     // Get the data
00856     do
00857     {
00858         // Get the first 5 characters of the line
00859         is.get((char*)TmpS,5);
00860         // Add them to the line
00861         str += (char*)TmpS;
00862 
00863         is.get( c );
00864 
00865         if ( c == '\n' )
00866         {
00867             LineIsNotTerminated = false;
00868         }
00869         else
00870         {
00871             // push back the character in the input
00872             is.unget();
00873 
00874             // Loop again
00875             LineIsNotTerminated = true;
00876         }
00877     }
00878     while ( LineIsNotTerminated == true );
00879 
00880     return is;
00881 }
00882 
00883 /*
00884  * @brief A serialisation input operator
00885  * @param [in] is, an input stream
00886  * @param [in] str2, a char * buffer (ended by '0')
00887  * @return Returns the input stream
00888  */
00889 std::ostream& Omiscid::operator<<( std::ostream &os, const SimpleString &str )
00890 {
00891     os << str.GetStr();
00892     return os;
00893 }

00897 const char* SimpleString::GetStr() const
00898 {
00899     return (const char*)stringData->data;
00900 }
00901 
00902 unsigned int SimpleString::GetLength() const
00903 {
00904     return stringData->length;
00905 }
00906 
00907 bool SimpleString::IsEmpty() const
00908 {
00909     return (stringData == NULL || stringData->length == 0 );
00910 }
00911 
00912 bool SimpleString::operator==(const SimpleString& str) const
00913 {
00914     return stringData->Equals(*(str.stringData));
00915 }
00916 
00917 bool SimpleString::operator==(const char* str) const
00918 {
00919     return stringData->Equals(str);
00920 }
00921 
00922 bool SimpleString::operator!=(const SimpleString& str) const
00923 {
00924     return stringData->NotEquals(*(str.stringData));
00925 }
00926 
00927 bool SimpleString::operator!=(const char* str) const
00928 {
00929     return stringData->NotEquals(str);
00930 }
00931 
00933 bool SimpleString::EqualsCaseInsensitive(const SimpleString& str) const
00934 {
00935     return stringData->EqualsCaseInsensitive(*(str.stringData));
00936 }
00937 
00939 bool SimpleString::EqualsCaseInsensitive(const char * str) const
00940 {
00941     return stringData->EqualsCaseInsensitive(str);
00942 }
00943 
00944 bool SimpleString::Latin1ToUTF8( const char *Src, char * Latin1ToUTF8Buffer, int SizeOfBuffer )
00945 {
00946     const char * parse = Src;
00947     int res;
00948 
00949     if ( parse == NULL )
00950         return false;
00951 
00952     for( res=0; res < SizeOfBuffer; parse++, res++ )
00953     {
00954         if ( *parse == '\0' )
00955         {
00956             Latin1ToUTF8Buffer[res] = '\0';
00957             break;
00958         }
00959         if ( (*parse & 0x80) == 0 ) // ASCII 7
00960         {
00961             Latin1ToUTF8Buffer[res] = *parse;
00962             continue;
00963         }
00964         else
00965         {
00966             if ( res+1 >= (SizeOfBuffer+1) )
00967             {
00968                 return false;
00969             }
00970 
00971             Latin1ToUTF8Buffer[res]   = (char)0xc3;
00972             Latin1ToUTF8Buffer[++res] = (char)(*parse-64);
00973         }
00974     }
00975 
00976     if ( res >= SizeOfBuffer )
00977         return false;
00978 
00979     return true;
00980 }

00983 
00984 #include <System/ElapsedTime.h>
00985 #include <System/Event.h>
00986 #include <System/Socket.h>
00987 
00988 int SimpleString::TestFunction()
00989 {
00990     // Test of SimpleString...
00991 
00992     SimpleString Test("metis.local.");
00993 
00994     bool Modif = false;
00995     Test = Socket::RemoveLocalDomain( Test, Modif );
00996 
00997     SimpleString Tutu;
00998 
00999     Tutu = "\\032Yop";
01000     OmiscidTrace( "%s\n", Tutu.GetStr() );
01001     Tutu.ReplaceFirst( "\\032", " " );
01002     OmiscidTrace( "%s\n", Tutu.GetStr() );
01003 
01004     Tutu = "Yop\\032";
01005     OmiscidTrace( "%s\n", Tutu.GetStr() );
01006     Tutu.ReplaceFirst( "\\032", " " );
01007     OmiscidTrace( "%s\n", Tutu.GetStr() );
01008 
01009     Tutu = "Yop\\032blib";
01010     OmiscidTrace( "%s\n", Tutu.GetStr() );
01011     Tutu.ReplaceFirst( "\\032", " " );
01012     OmiscidTrace( "%s\n", Tutu.GetStr() );
01013 
01014     Tutu = "Yop\\0 liajezijclz jl ijzzlij blib";
01015     OmiscidTrace( "%s\n", Tutu.GetStr() );
01016     Tutu.ReplaceFirst( "\\032", " " );
01017     OmiscidTrace( "%s\n", Tutu.GetStr() );
01018 
01019     Tutu = "Yop\\032liajezijclz jl ijzzlij blib";
01020     OmiscidTrace( "%s\n", Tutu.GetStr() );
01021     Tutu.ReplaceAll( "\\032", " " );
01022     OmiscidTrace( "%s\n", Tutu.GetStr() );
01023 
01024     Tutu = "Yop\\032liajezijclz jl\\032 ijzzlij blib";
01025     OmiscidTrace( "%s\n", Tutu.GetStr() );
01026     Tutu.ReplaceAll( "\\032", "+++" );
01027     OmiscidTrace( "%s\n", Tutu.GetStr() );
01028 
01029     return 0;
01030 }
01031 #endif // OMISCID_RUNING_TEST
